channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A sequence of compact metric spaces and an isometric embedding into the Gromov-Hausdorff space
item.description: arXiv:2507.07449v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: For a convergent series with positive terms, we prove that the $\ell^\infty$ product space of bounded subspaces of the Gromov-Hausdorff space can be isometrically embedded into the Gromov-Hausdorff space, where each subspace consists of compact metric spaces with the diameter less than or equal to the term.
item.dc:creator: Takuma Byakuno
